quote: I believe that every human mind feels pleasure in doing good to another.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion.
author: Martha Graham

quote: A cloudy day is no match for a sunny disposition.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: If two wrongs don't make a right, try three.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: If you can't describe what you are doing as a process, you don't know what you're doing.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Weather forecast for tonight: dark.
author: George Carlin

quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Science is a beautiful gift to humanity; we should not distort it.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: He that is good for making excuses is seldom good for anything else.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
author: Edward Teller

quote: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.
author: Billy Graham

quote: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Berger

quote: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss
